headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Retail Sector Stocks Rise Amid Rate Cut Hopes
summary: The S&P 500 jumped 1.5% on Monday, Aug. 4, 2025, snapping a four-day losing streak amid a wave of optimism that interest rates could be headed lower.

content.title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Retail Sector Stocks Rise Amid Rate Cut Hopes
content.summary: The S&P 500 jumped 1.5% on Monday, Aug. 4, 2025, snapping a four-day losing streak amid a wave of optimism that interest rates could be headed lower.

thumbnail.caption: Michael Nagle / Bloomberg / Getty Images The S&P 500 rallied after posting its biggest weekly decline since May last week.

headline: Why onsemi (ON) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of analog chips maker onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) fell 11.3% in the afternoon session after the company reported second-quarter financial results that showed shrinking profit margins and an earnings miss, overshadowing a revenue beat. The semiconductor manufacturer posted revenue of $1.47 billion, which topped analyst forecasts. headline: Palantir's Army deal, ON Semi earnings, Opendoor jumps
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman tracks Monday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Palantir (PLTR) stock is rising ahead of earnings, fueled by a $10 billion Army contract and a 500% stock surge over the past year. ON Semiconductor (ON) stock slips after its second quarter results met expectations, with management citing signs of market stabilization. Opendoor (OPEN) stock jumps as retail investors eye the company's earnings results on Tuesday. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Palantir's Army deal, ON Semi earnings, Opendoor jumps
content.description:
Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman tracks Monday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute.

Palantir (PLTR) stock is rising ahead of earnings, fueled by a $10 billion Army contract and a 500% stock surge over the past year.

ON Semiconductor (ON) stock slips after its second quarter results met expectations, with management citing signs of market stabilization.

Opendoor (OPEN) stock jumps as retail investors eye the company's earnings results on Tuesday.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
content.summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman tracks Monday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Palantir (PLTR) stock is rising ahead of earnings, fueled by a $10 billion Army contract and a 500% stock surge over the past year. ON Semiconductor (ON) stock slips after its second quarter results met expectations, with management citing signs of market stabilization. Opendoor (OPEN) stock jumps as retail investors eye the company's earnings results on Tuesday. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: ON Semi Earnings Met Expectations. The Stock Is Falling, Anyway.
summary: Shares of  ON Semiconductor ON Semiconductor  were falling Monday after the chip maker’s quarterly earnings and revenue met Wall Street’s expectations.  The company reported adjusted earnings per share of 53 cents for the second quarter, meeting analysts’ consensus call for 53 cents, according to FactSet.  ON shares have fallen 10% this year and 16% over the last 12 months as of Friday’s close, due in part to a decline in demand from the auto industry, one of the company’s key end markets.

content.title: ON Semi Earnings Met Expectations. The Stock Is Falling, Anyway.
content.summary: Shares of  ON Semiconductor ON Semiconductor  were falling Monday after the chip maker’s quarterly earnings and revenue met Wall Street’s expectations.  The company reported adjusted earnings per share of 53 cents for the second quarter, meeting analysts’ consensus call for 53 cents, according to FactSet.  ON shares have fallen 10% this year and 16% over the last 12 months as of Friday’s close, due in part to a decline in demand from the auto industry, one of the company’s key end markets.

headline: Onsemi posts quarterly revenue drop, sees dull third-quarter profit on market uncertainty
summary: Sales growth in battery electric vehicles has slowed due to an uncertain economic environment, brought on by global import duties, and elevated borrowing costs in the U.S.  This has been forcing automakers to reassess production plans and withhold financial investments, affecting companies such as Onsemi.  However, Onsemi said it sees "signs of stabilization" across its end markets, after a prolonged slump in demand due to excess chip supply.

content.title: Onsemi posts quarterly revenue drop, sees dull third-quarter profit on market uncertainty
content.summary: Sales growth in battery electric vehicles has slowed due to an uncertain economic environment, brought on by global import duties, and elevated borrowing costs in the U.S.  This has been forcing automakers to reassess production plans and withhold financial investments, affecting companies such as Onsemi.  However, Onsemi said it sees "signs of stabilization" across its end markets, after a prolonged slump in demand due to excess chip supply.

headline: ON Semiconductor Faces Pricing Pressures, But CEO Sees Market Stabilization Ahead
summary: ON Semiconductor Corp. (NASDAQ: ON) reported its fiscal second-quarter 2025 results on Monday. The stock dropped after the company reported a quarterly revenue decline of 15.36% year-on-year (Y/Y) to $1.47 billion, topping the analyst consensus estimate of $1.45 billion. The adjusted EPS of 53 cents is in line with the analyst consensus estimate. Also Read: ON Semiconductor Jumps After Nvidia Deal—Is This The Next Big AI Power Play? Revenue from Power Solutions Group (PSG) declined 16% Y/Y to $6

headline: onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) Q2: Beats On Revenue But Stock Drops
summary: Analog chips maker onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 15.4% year on year to $1.47 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $1.52 billion at the midpoint, 1.3% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.53 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) Q2: Beats On Revenue But Stock Drops
content.summary: Analog chips maker onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 15.4% year on year to $1.47 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $1.52 billion at the midpoint, 1.3% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.53 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.
